content: {"name": "SICS Arrochar Friendship Club", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Must be above 60 years of age", "email": "", "url": "https://www.nyconnects.ny.gov/services/arrochar-neighborhood-senior-center-sofanypp1901", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "85 Jerome Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10305", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.596335, "longitude": -74.075671}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 720-6110", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}]}
